# 45.1.8 Concentration of Advances

The Bank's top 10 exposures on the basis of total (funded and non-funded) exposures aggregated to Rs 1,050,494.038 million (2023: Rs 574,511.968 million).

| |2024|2023|
|---|---|---|
|Funded|931,966,430|360,158,898|
|Non-funded|118,527,608|214,353,070|
|Total exposure|1,050,494,038|574,511,968|

45.1.8.1 The sanctioned limits against these top 10 exposures aggregated to Rs 1,195,888.813 million (2023: Rs 682,802.632 million).

45.1.8.2 All of the above exposures are performing.
